title: Mary Shotwell Little // 77
description:
In October 1965, a woman in Atlanta met her friend for dinner- but once the two parted ways, she vanished. Between seemingly staged evidence, strange sightings in a different states, and frightening phone calls before her disappearance, this case proves to be incredibly bizarre. This is the disappearance of Mary Shotwell Little.

BONUS EPISODES: https://www.patreon.com/goingwestpodcast
